about_the_game:
Has Dr. Friedrich gone too far in her experimentation? Experience ANDERSON's favorite music .

Credits

Composed and produced by Garrett Hickey

Content Creation License

1. By purchasing this soundtrack, you are granted a "Limited License" for content creation and public presentation in conjunction with any recorded ANDERSON gameplay footage.
2. Limited License allows the purchaser (you) to use any song, in its entirety, in content creation (example: youtube video, twitch streams, etc.) in conjunction exclusively with ANDERSON footage.
3. If you have any questions about this Content Creation License, please feel free to reach out to the listed contact email.
